title: Man fined Dh2,000 for peeping at woman inside Dubai Mall washroom
content: A Sri Lankan cleaner will have to pay Dh2,000 fine after a court convicted him of entering the women’s washroom at Dubai Mall and looking at a Filipina while she used the facility Dubai: A Sri Lankan cleaner will have to pay Dh2,000 fine after a court convicted him of entering the women’s washroom at…
